resource.chars:
Hotel de la Plage 
Etretat
Dear Sir Archibald 
Although I received the Meteorological Volume 
of the Nat. Antarctic Expedition nearly a month ago 
I have only recently been able to give it my 
attention; this I think may be excused as I have 
spent the interval in getting married!
On this account only I am late in writing 
a strong protest concerning Mr Shaw’s Preface 
to the volume 
I weigh my words well in saying that many 
of his remarks are grossly unfair and some prorably 
inaccurate.
My indignation is shared by the other members of the 
Expedition and on their account as well as my own 
I cannot let such remarks pass unquestioned 
But I think it right to consult you before 
taking any steps as the volume is published 
by the Royal Society, though as I need <s>not <\s> scarcely add 
that I know that you must have been ignorant 
that it contained objectionable matter.
I should be glad if you would let me know 
when I could come and see you - I <s>shall <\s> am
